posts.title: Richland wal mart - missed connections
posts.body: You had red hair glasses on and a red dress we kept looking at each other.  What color shirt did i have on

posts.title: Any Man - missed connections
posts.body: Who can come to Clarksburg to get some good dome from a chunky white girl ;) I'm ready!! Have two requirements #1 is that you be able and willing to come to meet me && #2 is, well, if you don't know, message me and ask.. Or tell me what you offer :)

posts.title: You were on your front porch - missed connections
posts.body: Seen you sitting on your from porch on Jackson Street. I'm pretty sure you were getting your grass cut at the time. Anyhow...I was on my motorcycle and beeped as I rode by, you waved back, so I'm assuming you either found me as attractive as I found you or you were wondering who the hell beeped. Lol. Anyhow, I'd like to chat sometime, you're super cute.

posts.title: Brooke it's Brett from ahem Uber Pool - missed connections
posts.body: Bourdain and Spade and crazy families aside, I'll never Pool again, unless its with you.I'd like to see you again.
